<Text: Doris (mythology):  She was the daughter of Oceanus and Tethys and the wife of Nereus.>
Triplets:<Doris
3:
--------------------
<Text: Doris (mythology):  Doris was mother to Nerites and the fifty Nereids, including Thetis, who was the mother of Achilles, and Amphitrite, Poseidon's wife, and mother of Triton.>
Triplets:<Doris
